infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to set up your work geofence and track when you're at work.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app tracks your location to automatically log your work hours when you arrive at and leave your workplace.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app tracks your location in the background to automatically log your work hours.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: WorkTimeTracker uses location to detect when you arrive at and leave your workplace automatically.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow WorkTimeTracker to use your location to automatically track work hours.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow WorkTimeTracker to use your location in the background to track when you arrive and leave work.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow WorkTimeTracker to access your location to set up geofencing.
